reviews.reviewTitle: 1 minute and you have boiling water
reviews.reviewText: love it, use it for my tea and bought one for my friend for soups and oatmeal and tea and it is faster than a microwave and you can do so much with it, i can even throw a handful of loose tiesta tea in with sugar and water and turn it on and i dont even have to mix it the boiling mixes it by itself lol just pour some hot tea and im set. i can even use it to rewarm my tea. its very easy to clean it all back out too.

I purchased this 2 months ago and use it daily in the morning to boil water. I tried contacting the seller to make things right but there was no option available to do so. In short, the little filter tip snapped off one when opening the lid. Without it, the lid will not close and then you cannot use the pot to boil water.  2 months of mild use and it breaks. Buyer beware.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works great, looks good on my counter.
reviews.reviewText: "I use this to quickly boil water for teas and instant coffees.  I also use it to boil water if I need it fast for a dish Im in a hurry to cook and cant wait for the water to boil on the stove top.  Ive only been using this for less than a week now but so far am happy with it.  Will update only if I have issues with it."

"Heats up really quickly, no matter how much water I put in it. Never takes more than 5 minutes to come to a complete boil. Its a TAD bit noisy (hissing sound) when it first starts to boil, but its not intolerable. I actually love it. Great purchase."

"Product looks great.  This is the second item of the same product Ive received and both had the same issue.  There is a rubber piece that connects the lid to the handle of the tea kettle.  The left side of the rubber piece was hanging off as it wasnt glued as viewed in the attached pictures..  The same defect was on both products I ordered.  Very frustrating!!"

"I like to make tea, and I usually make it in the microwave but this is convenient for when I am using the microwave for something else.  It doesnt take long at all to boil water in this.  The blue light is neat to look at, too.  I have found this kettle to be easy to use and I just rinse it between uses since I only put water in it.  I have not had to clean it with vinegar yet."

We have only used it a few times but it is a good filler until the limit lasts 8 minutes until it boils and automatically turns off that using cold water you want to 55 degrees my wife loves it, solo la hemos usado algunas veces pero es buena llenadora asta el limite dura 8 minutos esactos asta que hierbe y se apaga automatica mente eso usando agua fria quisas a 55 grados mi esposa la adora

"So far I really like this kettle! I love that the water does not come in contact with any plastic parts, that was very important for me. The water boils fast, the blue light looks cool, and its easy to clean. Oh yeah, and the price is very reasonable. What more can you ask for?"

"I got this because its a glass vessel, which is not only more attractive but also gives you more information about the status of your water as it gets to boiling temperature.  Maybe for a few bucks you dont care, or maybe buying breakable glass things in your kitchen is Right Out. But if you like function and form and breakage is not a concern, then this is a pretty good choice."

"I bought this to replace my old Cuisinart kettle which gave out after 5 good years of service. Chose the Cosori because of its transparency. It is attractive (with a cool blue light when its on), boils water quickly - hoping that it is durable as well. Very pleased with this purchase."

reviews.reviewTitle: Heats very quickly to precise temperature setting
reviews.reviewText: "A very nice tea kettle with a variety of pre-set temperatures, or simple boil and warm options.  Will maintain the heat for a while after it reaches the set temperature, or you can change it to just warm.  I use it for making green and black teas, and its a big help in quickly boiling or heating water for cooking such as pasta or polenta."

The LED lighting is a nice touch; it makes the boiling water beautiful to watch. The British STRIX thermoter system is fantastic. The heater sits in the center of the base and the kettle is placed on top of it and is easily removed from the base so that there are no cords to the actual kettle, only to the base. I love this kettle.

"Disappointed that it only gives metric measurements on the carafe. If youre going to sell in the US please add our measurement system.  Ive only used Spring Water in it and after 3 days its leaving a residue on the bottom of the carafe.  I wouldnt buy again."

I really like the large capactity of the kettle, and it heats up water pretty quickly.  I did have an issue with the auto off feature though, and I contacted their support about it.  They very quickly issued a replacement, so i should have that shortly.  I was very impressed with the quick resolution from their support team.  I would definitely recommend to all.

reviews.reviewTitle: attractive and does the job well
reviews.reviewText: "I spent hours pouring (pun intended) over reviews of electric tea kettles. A simple purchase quickly got complicated when I read about different buyers complaints. Finally, I bought this kettle, and Im very pleased. It brings water to a full boil quickly. It shuts off as its supposed to do. It does NOT leave any aftertaste in the boiled water. It looks nice on my counter. The lid pops completely open so you can easily wash the whole inside of the pot.  Ive had it for two weeks and no problems whatsoever. Go for it!"

Just looove it- heats up fast., love the color lighting.., easy to clean and pour and it is very easy to use. The glass finish is elegant. The quality is very good as well. Everyday I use it more than 3 to 4 times for coffee and other cooking’s., and this thing saves my time. I strongly recommend this product.

"This Cosori Electric kettle replaces an older all metal construction kettle and has been a workhorse. The glass gives you great feedback on the boiling process and it is very quite compared to my old one. Excellent design and construction makes this a great buy. Im very happy with this purchase, and highly recommend it."

My routine is to come home from work, lay out 3-5 mugs with tea bags and lemons, and pour boiling hot water in to steep them., I recently went to Japan and thought i would come back with a tea set, but i did have the desire to bring one back...i really just wanted something to boil quickly and provide a ton of fluid. This has worked out marvelously. The blue LED and clear glass style makes it fun to watch also., Id say i havnt inspected it so so closely to know for sure, but idk if the lid comes off so cleaning it gets a 4 instead of a 5 for that. When i fill it all the way to the top line or a little more it takes roughly 5 minutes maybe to boil. Just fyi =)

I decided to order this kettle after seeing soneone on You Tube with it.  I liked that it auto shuts off.  I accidently burned the bottom of my stove top glass kettle twice., so auto shut off is a must.  I love the size of it too.  It heats up very quickly too.

Looks much nicer than our years old plastic kettle. We bought this because there is clinical evidence that drinking above room temperature water from plastic is a health hazard. I’m not a health freak but the evidence is quite convincing. Better safe than sorry since we use electric kettles frequently
"After only 2 months it started leaking water & I cant even return or replace it!"

This kettle is loud and a bit scary when you first use it. I read many reviews of spots appearing in the kettle, and it did happen to me as well when I used the water from the faucet. However, I managed to take them off by washing it because I saw the spots right away., "If you use bottled water or purified water, the spots wont appear.", Other than that, it does the job at heating fast between 2 to 3 min depending on the amount of water.

"But its hard to understand how it can be so LOUD!!!", "Plus there is a tan build up on the bottom that clouds the water and is impossible to clean.  Im throwing this kettle out.  Definitely do not recommend for this reason alone (plus it is LOUD, the water boils forever before it shuts off, theres no sound to let you know the water has boiled.  Its just a useless kettle."

reviews.reviewTitle: Misleading picture, Not easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: "I like the Kettle but its hard to clean. it doesnt open enough to use your hand to clean as shown in picture. Misleading pictures"

I absolutely love this kettle! Set and forget....no running to the stove to turn off. It does have a plastic handle and plastic blue lighting ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE GLASS CONTAINER. The on/off switch can be turned off to heat a little or Let  full boil. Cold tap water takes 7 minutes to boil, hot tap 3 min. After shutoff the water stays hot for hours...

reviews.reviewTitle: Great kettle and great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for heating water for coffee and tea-my stove is from the early 50’s and while it’s a gorgeous piece, it’s not energy efficient. The kettle worked beautifully, and the blue light was a nice touch when boiling water early in the morning. After only four months though, it stopped working. Bummed about this, I reached out to Cosori, as the kettle comes with a one year warranty. They offered a few troubleshooting tips, and when those didn’t work, asked for a screenshot of my receipt, a video of the kettle and it’s problem, and I’ve got a new one on its way to me! Wonderful customer service, and hopefully this new kettle will keep on chugging!
Went to Ireland, discovered electric kettles. Bought this one, life is a lot better. It’s not “I’m in Ireland better” but it’s better with this kettle.

reviews.reviewTitle: Auto Shut-Off Failed in a Matter of Days.
reviews.reviewText: "The auto shut-off failed within the first few uses. Weve not been rough with it, its been handled gently, but it just took longer and longer for the switch to disengage until it was no longer working at all."

"I was uncertain about the cordless pots but a friend had a stainless one that worked well so I bought this one. 1) The blue lights turn on while heating and are very cool - the most important requirement you know. It heats up quickly. Ive chosen to use only distilled water to prevent mineral/sediment accumulation. The pot cleans up in a jiffy with the wide opening. I have no complaints whatsoever with its design or manufacture. I would happily recommend to a friend."

reviews.reviewTitle: A lot better than previous kettle
reviews.reviewText: "I use this daily and havent ran into any issues. I havent noticed rust or fail uses. I normally heat half the kettle of water for about a minute or right before boiling point, I use it to heat water for tea. Important to replace water every other day, I normally dont wash mine, i just do a rinse, boiling water in general is sanitary."

reviews.reviewTitle: I love the glass kettle - PBA free
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful kettle. Working well for now., Opening lid is tricky - hard to explain but it opens so quietly & slowly that it is difficult not to keep trying to open repeatedly. similarly w/ on off switch. The soft touch takes getting used too. I’m afraid it will break.

I really am enjoying this verses the breville i had that was not well made. The water seems to boil quicker in tvis tempered glass too and i love the light and being about to see it boil 😍 quick and efficient, there is a strainer built in the spout also, which i love. You can make herbal infusions and it strains for you

"Weve been using our Cosori Electric Kettle for a little over a week and are very happy with it.  Easy to clean, solid materials - doesnt feel cheap, and love that its BPA free.  We use it all the time, throughout the day and evening.  Ive used vinegar (per instructions) to keep it from scaling, which has worked beautifully.  The only cons are:  the handle isnt the most comfortable - kinda of big in width, and its a bit heavy (due to the glass) after adding water.  I guess the positive to that is Im getting a bi-cep workout.  :)"

"I use it for my french press. I bought this one because I couldnt find a french water boiler.", It boils water when you press a button, and it stops when it hits the right temperature., Common knowledge would suggest probably not drinking the water directly after it auto shuts off.

I have been using my Corsi Electric Kettle for nearly two months and could not be happier. This is my first purchase of this kind, I have always relied on my microwave for heating water, but I wish I had this kettle long ago. I just cleaned it for the first time using half and half water and white vinegar and now it looks like new. Excellent performance from an excellent product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Durable, easy to use, and attractive
reviews.reviewText: "Ive had this kettle for about 1.5 months now. I bought it because it holds a fair amount of water, looks nice with the glass walls, and has a blue light when it is heating up. I have not been disappointed. The value for the money I spent is excellent. I keep it on a wooden desk, but do not have to worry about a fire hazard because the kettle holder and the base of the kettle itself are very well-insulated. It heats up a full 1.70 L of water in about 2 or 3 minutes. Not as loud as an older kettle that I had, either (though it inevitably makes noise as the water begins to boil). Also, because it is glass, it is easy to see inside to clean. I would definitely recommend this kettle to anyone who wants a sleek and modern-looking appliance."

"I purchased this about a week ago. It came very quick and with no damages. I am a big tea drinker and didnt have a whole amount of patience for waiting on water to boil on a stove. I use to pop the water and tea bag in the microwave. This item gets the water to boiling in just a minute or two. I totally love it!!! The temperature of the water is extremely hot so just be careful if there are any kids around so they dont accidently get burned. I would recommend this unit to anyone!"

I love my new water heater. I loved the idea of heating water through electricity rather than on a stove but I had no idea how quickly it would be and how much time I would save. I can make tea in 2 minutes which saves me from being late on most days. I love this kettle and I would recommend to anyone that heats water regularly

Very nice design, simple and easy to use.  It took around 7-8 minutes to boil, so that was a little longer than I thought, but it was also with a full pot.  Reasonable price on sale, came fast and seriously, I loved the light coming on and off and the pot turning itself off when boiling is over.  I would buy it again, and recommend this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: very efficient and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: heats/boils water quickly and efficiently. is very simple to use and easy to clean. do be careful while it is heating as the steam comes through the spout, so if you have it under a cabinet you could get condensation marks on the under side of the cabinet.  the glass body does get very hot to the touch, obviously, so watch out for accidentally touching it.

"If youve ever become impatient waiting for a pot of water to boil on the stove, here is your solution! And being made of glass, theres no leaching of chemicals into the water that you might get from plastic containers or certain types of pots and pans."

I just got the electric kettle yesterday in the mail. I plugged it in to test it, filled it to the "max," and the water was boiling in minutes. It shut off right after it was boiling, for safety reason, and I like that feature. This product is so cool. Thank you for making my morning coffee, tea, and anything else that requires hot water, easier and faster. Oh, also a 2 year warranty is nice.

I accidently broke our previous kettle and needed a new one.  The Cosori electric kettle arrived well packaged and works like a charm.  It heats water quickly and is easy to clean.  The blue LED lights are pretty impressive as well!

I bought this as a gift for my sister last Thanksgiving, and she loved it! It was the star of the party as we watched it light up and boil for our after meal drinks! After nearly a year, she still uses and loves it! I also plan to buy myself one here soon. :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Never knew what I was missing!
reviews.reviewText: I mainly looked into this product to make coffee for my husband to help brighten his early mornings. I realized there are many other things to use this product for, so I definitely feel it was worth the money. So far, it works great and is so much more convenient and faster!

reviews.reviewTitle: A Great Fast And Easy Pot
reviews.reviewText: "This is a great pot and actually look at while it is working.  Its fast to boil and easy cleanup.  Although the pot has a nice blue light to indicate when it is working, it would be great if it would beep when the water is ready.  Other than this, I love this thing."

"We use this for cup noodles and my wife for warm water during the winter to keep her warm. Its a nice kettle with a lot of capacity and that is great. It is especially nice to show approximate levels and that will come in handy as we figure out how much we need for various things. We have found that it also does a pretty good job at heating water quickly. Were happy with it!"

"Weve only had it a couple of weeks, but it is attractive, easy to use and heats water fairly quickly.  The instructions say it has to be de-scaled once a week, which is a pain and probably not necessary.  The kettle will be lucky if we de-scale it once a month!  Does anybody else have experience with descaling?  Our previous electric kettle (OXO) lasted three years and we never de-scaled it!"

I had an issue with the first kettle I received, I think it was just a fluke on that particular kettle, and I wrote a review about it. I was immediately contacted by Cosori- they offered me a new one without me even asking! In no time a had a new, perfect kettle at my front door. It’s a beautiful kettle, and I would recommend it to anyone- and amazing customer service!

This is my second cordless electric kettle and it better than the last.  First one of different brand had a really hard time opening since the latch kept sticking but this one is made really sturdy and I think it will last.  I use it at least twice a day and its showing no signs of trouble.

"I like the glass look of it. Very sleek and clean. The lights when its boiling is also a very nice design touch. I took a star off because Im not sure about the temperature of the glass in that I would be wary of putting in cold water just after boiling a pot."

reviews.reviewTitle: Takes about 8 minutes but not bad
reviews.reviewText: "I like how easy to use it is, and because of its design, its easy to pour into whatever youre pouring the hot water into, compared to say, a pot on the stove. Its transparent so its easy to tell when it needs to be cleaned. The LED light is bright at night, but not during the day."

reviews.reviewTitle: Strong smell of plastic; Company unreachable
reviews.reviewText: 1. STRONG plastic smell, 2. Tried to register it & the website in the manual is a dead link, 3. Company website is 100% Chinese & cant be navigated, 4. Support email is returned as "unknown", I am returning it.

"I cant believe the quality for this price. Beautiful kettle, actually pretty lightweight.",  I love that it has minimal plastic., The bottom is actually metal, not glass, but it is what all glass kettles have., "Weve been using it for couple of weeks and I dont know what not to like"

I wanted to give this a higher score.  This works as advertised. My issue is almost immediately after use of begins to develop these stains that cannot be cleaned off.  It appears to be burned in.  This is very disappointing.

reviews.reviewTitle: RUSTED AFTER A FEW USES STAY AWAAAYYYY!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: "Terrible product. Rust spots appear after just a few uses, it is a complete rip-off. Unfortunately Im passed my return period, but dont make the same dumb mistake I made and buy this just because it is fairly cheap, large and kind of cool looking. Its a total unadulterated trash of a product.", STAY AWAY FROM THIS RUSTY GARBAGE!!!!!!!!, "Im serious dont even look at any other review and move on to a different product."

"Nice looking, good quality and big! We had a more expensive one before that lasted a while so I wasnt sure if I should go with a cheaper one. I love the ease of use and the blue light. I wish it showed different measurements but I guess I should brush up on my conversions anyways. Other ones have a temperature control feature but we just needed the boil."

reviews.reviewTitle: The worst quality product I have ever seen
reviews.reviewText: This tea kettle looks great, lights up room like Christmas tree beautiful but will stop heating water after 4 days (that was my experience).  So, this is an effective light fixture but not an appliance.  Returning it back after 4 days.  This is a second attempt at getting a good replacement tea kettle. The first one had (different manufacturer) rattling parts out of the box and it went back in the same box right away.

"Purchased this Cosori after our 3rd Capresso died in the space of 2 years. This kettle hold a lot of water and when full, it takes about 8 minutes to come to a full boil. I just put 3-4 cups of water in most of the time and it boils in a minute or two. Not as fast as the Capresso but hopefully it will last longer. Also, its only 1/2 the price. It is easy to clean."

"I have this at work and its great. The kettle is sturdy and I love how the top comes off and I can fit my hand in it to clean. The base doesnt get warm when I turn it on and it heats within five or so minutes. The blue light is nice and it is relatively quiet, since I work in a call center that is a bonus!"

Bought this last October and it stopped working after 9 months, i didn’t even use it often..... The lid won’t shut, keeps popping up open. The heat sensor stopped working at the same time. It keeps heating water until the water dries out. I stopped when i saw it it could be very dangerous.

Love the design, looks stylish. I love that it has a wide opening for easy cleaning. I also like the blue lighting, the glass kettle body, its large capacity. Only one thing I wish it has - it is to open more gracefully when I press to open the lid, but no big deal there. Perfect and wonderful looking kettle!!

Overall I really like this kettle! It heats quickly, has a great safety shutoff feature and is relatable. However, I noticed that it was getting residue along the same spot along the bottom where the water starts to bubble and the water started to taste funny, even washing it regularly and scrubbing it to try to remove it. I ended up filling the kettle half full - half water and half vinegar and boiling it, then letting it sit for about 20 mins and washing it. It cleared up the residue and is working like a charm again! If you’re having a similar problem give that a try.

reviews.reviewTitle: A hot water kettle that is super cool.
reviews.reviewText: "I love this hot water kettle.  It heats fast.  It is beautiful - clear glass with the cool blue light.  The best feature is that it does not spew hot steam onto my beautiful wood cabinets.  I thought all water kettles did.  This rarely happens, but now I want to see what else Cosori makes.  Im sold on their products.  I feel like I stepped up to a truly better product.  I have had no problems with it so far."

reviews.reviewTitle: "Now that Ive used it for a while..."
reviews.reviewText: Having used this electric kettle for several months,I am happy to report that it works perfectly.

I received a replacement and it worked just fine.  No discoloration was noted on the base. It did heat the water quickly and the cord was long enough so I did not have to keep close to the backsplash. Thanks for replacing the defective one quickly and thank you for reaching out to me by phone to correct the issue immediately :)

"Quiet and works great. I use 3x daily (once for coffee in the morning and 2x for tea in the afternoon for about 6 months so far). Easy to use, easy to clean. There really isnt a thing about it that I dont like. Would buy again."

reviews.reviewTitle: Sleek, classy, efficient. Well worth the buy.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using an old corningware tea kettle for ages (was passed down to me from my grandmother) and I love it; however, it’s never been terribly efficient, especially when my body is eager for a quick cuppa. I’ve been on the lookout for a nice electric kettle that doesn’t take up a ton of room and looks nice and I’ve found it with this one; it’s sleek and classy looking (and I love the blue lighting) and heats up very quickly. Everything so far has functioned as advertised and intended and it’s under nearly constant use in the mornings.

I bought this for my office, as I enjoy tea through the day and there was no hot water spigot in or near the office. It lights up a pretty blue, shuts off when boiling, and looks just fab. I get worried that someone will break it, but so far so good. Easy to clean and relatively lightweight.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not for everyday use - lasted less than 4 months
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this a little over four months ago. It is used every morning for French press coffee. This morning it completely stopped working. No issues to warn of its impending malfunction, but the on/off switch stopped working and simply quit on us. It was great when it worked - fast and convenient. Will go back to standard kettle on the stove.

"We usually buy one of the stainless steel type water kettles only to have them end up getting rust spots.  We tried this one by COSORI and, so far, we are very happy !  Got it, washed it and started using it.  We boil water with it for instant cereal, hot tea, when I want to boil something on the electric stove !  Yep, I start the water in this kettle, add it to a pan and then it boils much quicker.  Ive only had a couple of months, but this seems to be the best one we have had out of the other 3 brands we owned in the past."

Just started using this today. It’s awesome!! Tea was super tasty. If you drop it on tile you can kiss it goodbye though. Just sayin. Be mindful of the obviousness in being careful, especially with the hot glass. The carry handle is huge, so if you drop it... You’re a doofus. Comes with a warranty👍

reviews.reviewTitle: The Main Issue W/ These Things
reviews.reviewText: "Electric kettles are amazingness. However, the main issue can be rust. With this one, its majorly made out of glass. Also, you dont forget to empty out the water cause you can see the water & if its still hot water! Highly recommend it for it having mainly glass alone."

Electric kettles. Man how did most of we Americans not hear of these sooner? Works great. Only thing, as with most similar kettles, is once boiling shuts off. Those rare occasions where I want to keep water warm for more cups of whatever, I just use a stainless steel thermos. This kettle is clean, easy to use, and saves energy. Had it for half a year now and still great. Next Christmas everybody is getting one for sure!

"It is fast and pretty to look at.  Mostly I heat the water, drop in some tea bags and have tea all day.  When it cools off I just zap the cup of tea in the microwave.  I dont heat the water in the kettle again until the next day when I make a new batch of tea.  Easy to clean."

"I got the Cosori electric kettle so I wouldnt use so much gas when I wanted coffee.I have a propane tank that runs the stove/oven water heater and furnace.This heats the water so fast.Its really cool.It looks modern and clean and is so much faster than my stove for boiling water."

Love this kettle. I was so impressed how fast this heats up. In less than 2 mins you have some hot water but in about 4 mins total you have boiling water. I usually turn it off at this point however let it continue to boil it will turn itself off  once it gets to a cplete full boil.
Do not buy! After just one week use the bottoms have a lot of mildew. Can’t even clean it with vinegar or baking soda!!

"I love this kettle. It does have a leaking issue if held incorrectly, but it doesnt seem to be a defect in the product but a defect in design. Water can get inside the handle somehow, so when you pour sometimes it drips from within... strange but not a dealbreaker for the price, and if youre careful filling it, it shouldnt be a problem. I love turning off the lights in the kitchen and letting it do its thing."

reviews.reviewTitle: "Didnt know I would love this as much as I do"
reviews.reviewText: "This was recommended by a friend. I hesitated for months, but now wish Id gotten long ago. I didnt realize how useful this thing could be when I got it and am always surprised. Its the best! Very solidly built and shuts off automatically when water is boiling. Heats very fast!"

"My favorite appliance because its so cute. You can see the water boiling and it has auto shut off. Takes less than 2 minutes to heat to boiling. Love the lights and love that it is easy to store although I leave it on the counter all the time. Glass. Favorite."

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice, but it could be better
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful. My only suggestion would be for the lid to open further, or be removable. Cannot place this under the water spigot on the refrigerator to fill. If the lid was detachable, it would be perfect. It may seem petty, however it’s a pain.Otherwise, this operates as stated. Nice appearance.

I have been waiting to write this review to truly test out this product. After about a month of almost daily use, I can say that this was the best choice. Very simple to use, fast, and helpful in the kitchen. I would highly recommend to anyone who is looking for an affordable, reliable electric kettle.

I was considering a teapot for boiling water, but then I saw this item on YouTube.  It heats so fast and enables me to make hot cereals very quickly as well as hot chocolate, etc.  Happy I purchased this item instead of the teapot.

reviews.reviewTitle: I use it all the time!
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite thing in my kitchen! It literally takes no time at all to boil. It is so convenient. And it is so pretty! I love the blue light, but just in general it looks great sitting on my counter. Makes sanitizing baby stuff a breeze. I look forward to using this. From French press coffee to noodles, it is so incredibly helpful. I can’t get over how quickly it boils the water!

reviews.reviewTitle: Crapped out after less than a year.
reviews.reviewText: This kettle stopped working after 11 months. No signs of damage, it just stopped operating.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast, boiling water - Save time and electric
reviews.reviewText: "Its easy to fill, wide opening lid- just add filtered watered. Lid opens wide - easy to clean. There is a line to indicate max level fullness. I like the base lights up in a soft blue hue while heating the water. 1 button super easy, push down and it turns itself off once it boils. So much more energy efficient than boiling a tea pot on a cook top. Super quiet wont disturb even those people that arent morning people."

reviews.reviewTitle: Convenient and safe, and it’s glass!
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful electric kettle. Does the job quickly and easily.  I had a plastic kettle before this and the glass is so much better.  I gave it 4 stars for cleaning because the lid tends to get in the way when I wipe the inside after use.
I use this about 3 times a week and I love it. I bet tea and leave it in my fridge as Iced Tea.

boils water quite quickly; shuts off automatically.  The 1.7 litre size is perfect for several cups of tea (or coffee).  Glass seems very sturdy: bumped it lightly against the faucet by accident and no chips., Recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Do not buy, I’m looking for a refund !
reviews.reviewText: The lid is not wide open , hard to clean. It’s easy to get dirt, I just clean it and couple days ago , the water is already have a rusty taste . Bad bad bad !

"I love this electric kettle!  It heats up so fast, faster than the microwave or stovetop.  Its heavy, well made, and nice to look at.  I wont mind having it on my counter every day.  So glad I found this one!"

"This is my new favorite kitchen appliance! It makes boiling water faster than the stove or microwave, and the automatic shut off is nice, because I dont have to worry about forgetting it! It holds a lot of water, and it is easy to clean. I definitely recommend!"

"This thing is amazing! It heats cold water up super fast. I mean itll go from cold to boiling in just a couple minutes! And its fun to watch too. Its also easy to clean. Since I use it a lot i store it right on my countertop since it doesnt take up too much room."

I’ve had other electric kettles in the past, but this has been my favorite. It what’s up quickly, is easy to use, looks good, and holds a decent amount of water. The best part is that it is clear so you can see exactly what stage the water is at.

I have a stove top kettle, and planned on using this only periodically. However, this beautiful item has absolutely supplanted my stainless steel kettle. Be warned that you will want to clean it right after each use, because it is so pretty ❤️ I highly recommend.

"The kettle by Cosori came in great packaging and has a 2 year warranty that comes with it.  However within a week, the kettle started rusting with minor use-- I was using it to boil water for tea, and this brown rust stain started appearing and I cant seem to get rid of it."

reviews.reviewTitle: It really easy to boil hot water
reviews.reviewText: I have attached this to my smart WiFi socket so I fill the water at night and morning time when I go to shower, I turn it on using smart app (put a timer), so hot will ready for my morning tea., In cold, certain temperatures hot water good for drinking too.

We really like this product, at the beginning we concerned about the safety since it made by glass, but after a few, months’ usage that it works well for us. We need hot water more often and this product could boil water super quickly and easily.

"I bought this for my office and am so happy with it! Its super easy to clean and heats water up in practically no time. I love that you can see the amount of water, which is why I went with a glass design. Its sturdy and doesnt take up much space at all."

Got this for a friends as a house warming  gift. They like to make tea and  Coffee  .  He does not like to use the microwave to warm up water ; The blue light is very cool on the bottom of the glass.  Heats up water really fast .

"I have purchased this kettle in the past and I broke the glass by accident. I missed having my water heat so swiftly and missed seeing the cobalt blue light first thing in the morning. A silly thing yet important to me! The water heats up super fast and Ive never had an issue with it functioning well."
It is very nice. I would buy it again and recommend it., Couple of things to mention. 1. Use filtered water.  2. Empty it, when you are done., The glass will remain bright and clear

I am happy with my Kettle. I love that it is large and can make lots of hot water if multiple people are having beverages. The water heats up quickly. It shuts off automatically when water is heated. The on button is easy and lights up to indicate it is on.
The kettle is great looking and does the job when the lid closes. Unfortunately the lid is very flimsy and can easily break thereby rendering the kettle useless.

I use this for all kinds of stuff! Heating up water for my coffeee, dinner when I need to boil pasta, and heating up water to mix my bouillon in. It beats my keurig any day. I switched to French press coffee/tea and this is great and heats up in one minute or less!

This electric kettle is a godsend! Takes little to no time to get my water for my tea piping hot!! I highly recommend this product,  would purchase again and would make a wonderful gift!, "As all things hot, I would definitely keep this out of childrens reach as the water gets scalding hot."

I love this electric kettle. 1. glass  2. Boils water quickly. ( I may update this with review with specific data) 3. automatic shut-off works great.  This saves energy and there is no need to be concerned about boiling the pot dry.
it does the job, easy to clean, nice looking

This is a cross between a 30-60 seconds boil used with a Jet Boil but in a clean, safe, and constantly used state within the kitchen. We love this, the kids make hot chocolate and adults tea.  Brilliant product, way to solve a consumer pain point! I would highly recommend this product.  Thanks, Jeff
It is a great addition to my kitchen and heats up water really fast.

"I use well and septic where I live, so these usually build up a residue. This product is no different, but it is much easier to clean. The water cools quickly in the kettle, so it has its disadvantages, but if thats not an issue this works fine. My only worry is the lid hinge. It feels slightly looser than I would hope. So far, its held up, though."
Love this kettle so pretty, and the fact that you can also brew tea in it because it has a filter at the pouring opening.

"weve been using it several times a day for months. works great and easy to keep clean. never heard of cosori but this is the kind of simple inexpensive quality appliance we used to get from proctor-silex, toastmaster, etc."

Works as advertised.  You plug it in, turn it on, and in about three minutes you have boiling water.  Looks nice and seems to be well built.  Might have spent more for an electric kettle with temperature control for making tea and coffee, this gets the job done fine.

reviews.reviewTitle: The Best Electric Kettle we ever owned
reviews.reviewText: We Love our Cosori Kettle, heavy duty glass kettle it heats up 7+ cups water quickly and has a safety shut off if we "Forget"  and best of all, the kettle detaches from the base for easy cord-free use. Very useful at home and in our RV

reviews.reviewTitle: No cutoff when water comes to a boil
reviews.reviewText: Was disappointed to find that this otherwise nice Electric Kettle does not have a cut off when water comes to a boil - the water just keeps boiling which it seems could be dangerous.

"I LOVE this! A full pot boils in about 3 minutes. I dont know why the spout lid has a strainer because it says water only. So fast and easy to make 2 gallons of iced tea. Of course its great for a lot of things but tea was my goal."

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast easy and simple way to heat water
reviews.reviewText: I love this product.  It makes it easier and faster to make tea.  The pot is really pretty and illuminates with blue light when it is heating and turns off automatically when the water is ready.  I would highly recommend this !!

i bought this to try and help with making tea in the morning. i never had time to pull out the pot boil some water and make a batch of tea, but with this i can put water in it the night before. then flip the switch in the morning and i have an almost instant cup of hot tea ready to go!

"Love my new Cosori kettle!!  Unique in that its glass.  My old one was stainless steel and had a very small opening at the top - impossible to clean.  The Cosori has a wide opening - very easy to clean and dry.  Cool feature with the blue LED light!  Auto shutoff works great, it looks very stylish on the counter, whats not to love?!"

"This is my 3rd instant pot for this price range.  Well see how long it lasts, but it is by far the nicest quality.  Came to a boil faster than my old one and all the materials are better than the last two.  Very happy so far."
Heat the water quickly, Product is good looking, very easy to use

I really like the overall design and clear glass so that you can watch the water boil. This kettle boils water very fast. Temperature control is on/off - you get to boiling point for the kettle to turn itself off.

"Ive had a plain old Walmart electric kettle for years, and decided to upgrade when this popped up in daily deals. Woah! It is awesome. Not only does it light up and is easy to clean, but it boils the water realllly fast! Saves me time in the morning."
Really like our new kettle. Had a minor issue with the first one but it was replaced easily so rest assured they customer service is excellent! Writing this while enjoying a nice cup of hot tea.

reviews.reviewTitle: Seems to do what it claims
reviews.reviewText: "We havent had this very long, and we didnt have water all week-end - so I was using it to store water. lol! It seems to do what it claims to do, heat water. I love the blue light when its heating. As the weather gets colder, we will be using it more."

this works perfectly. My mom drinks tea every morning and now has boiling water within a minute or two, probably closer to one minute. easy to clean and looks good in the kitchen with the clear/silver style
A great electric kettle for big pots of tea. Fast boil and the lights are great to let you know it’s heating. Nice to see the water boiling with the glass construction.

Overall I like the design and function of this kettle.  I do not like that the stainless bottom started pitting after several uses and continues to get worse.  I plan on contacting the company shortly and see what they say about this.

This has been a game changer for making tea! So easy to use! Love that it automatically shuts off! The water stays hot for a long time so I can come back to it later., I have gone back and bought two more of these as housewarming gifts. We use it everyday!

reviews.reviewTitle: Boils the water in blue color!
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice looking kettle on my counter-top.  Make sure you do not fill the kettle to the rim because when it boils it spills out.
I’ve only used it 2 weeks and the lid is already broken.  The lid won’t close, so we can’t use it.

Excellent electric kettle - increased water capacity means more cups of coffee or tea can be made at one time.  Blue LEDs indicating kettle is heating up are great, automatic shut-off insures no dry pot over-heating and possibly being damaged., Outstanding value for the money!
"We love tea so this kettle came in handie.. The only issue i habe with it is its kinda loud and scary on 1st use but after that you get use to it."

reviews.reviewTitle: Rusts quickly - hard to keep clean
reviews.reviewText: Really nice kettle with one big drawback: it’s really hard to keep clean and the metal plate at the base rusts/scales really quickly. You have to dry between every use and clean with vinegar regularly, but even that doesn’t stop it. To be fair, this happens on stainless kettles too, but the glass makes it super visible. If someone could just make a full glass kettle like the old Pyrex ones...

Love this. Fast and Easy. Cleans well if you follow instructions. Cord does not wrap around/thread completely under the base for storage but does have a place underneath to thread the cord around once. I use it every day. The glass and blue LED light look nice when working. It does turn off automatically if you forget, which is a great safety feature. A little loud but no more than an oven kettle or pot of boiling water. Totally recommend the glass version.  My Mom has a black electric kettle and she always compliments how she likes mine better. I am partial to it.
The vendor sent me a replacement free of charge. The auto shut off works on the replacement. My only concern is I wish the plastic filter near the spout was removable.

I love how I can fit my hand inside to clean it. It heated the water very quickly and the kettle lifting from the base is a wonderful feature. I finally splurged on this after years of using a plastic kettle with a small opening and short cord so everything about this makes me happy
LOVE this. I go through a gallon of iced tea a day and this really makes that an easy task. LOVE LOVE LOVE! Very sturdy and fast. I am happy I tried this one.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great product worth your money.
reviews.reviewText: The kettle looks elegant and classy. Very easy and safe to use. I love it in my kitchen. The most important part is that the lid doesn’t open on itself when I pour the hot water out. It’s safe and tight.
This is my first electric kettle., "I use it nearly every day. Its a very large kettle, but doesnt really take up much space.", I am satisfied with this purchase.

We cannot use it with other appliances on at the same time in the kitchen. It has a strong wattage that it upsets the electrical system and causes a breakdown of the circuit breaker on the side that it is used. It has to be used solo.
This product is amazing. It heats six cups of water to a rolling boil in about five minutes or less. It sure has saved wear and tear on my microwave!
Metal bottom and glass side.  I specifically bought this so that I could reach my hand inside to hand wash it.  I am able to reach inside without any issues.

My husband and I wanted to quit drinking plastic molecules and micro-bits of metal/residue/scalings difficult to see & clean on the bottom of our stove-top metal teakettle. This teakettle appears to be a good choice and is easy to use. Looks beautiful on the counter and has easy-to-follow instructions for use, cleaning, & de-scaling.
Very easy to use.  And fast

I didn’t give this a 5 star, only because it takes forever to heat up the water. My last one was way faster. I never fill it right up, just half way. If you have things to do, it’s fine but I like my coffee first before I do anything.
The kettle works very fast and well. It usually heats up water within 2-3 minutes and the water stays hot for almost 30 minutes. It also looks very nice with the glass design and LED lights.

This hot water boiler has the right size for most 2-4 member families. Water boils fast and pours out easily. Only one small thing might still has room to improve: if the lid can be opened wider, people will find it easier to fill in. On the whole it is a good hot water kettle.

"I LOVE this! Ive had one before and just bought another after moving. The color is so nice when it lights up in the morning and at night. Love to see and hear the water boil - theres just something peaceful about it. Excellent quality."

reviews.reviewTitle: It works well. Gets the job done. Very satisfied with it.
reviews.reviewText: "I purchased this kettle to replace another one made by Melita which did a very good job for years, but one plastic piece in the top came off. Ive had it for several months and it works very well."

"Not only does this product look good it works very well I love the blue lights on it but overall I love the fact that its made of glass and I can see if there are any residue build- up from hard water. Ive had to throw away other pots because of hard-water buildup. This pot allows you to see whats going on while it looks beautiful."

"Very much like this kettle, simple design and the key part being that you can see the boil building and know when you want to shut it off before a full boil.  The only weird thing with the design is that the filter that covers the spout when the lid is closed gets in the way a bit when you go to fill up with water at your kitchen sink (you get used to tilting the pot a certain way to make it work - maybe if the lid opened up wider this wouldnt happen?)."

I LOVE my Cosori electric kettle. I have had it for about a week now and use it multiple times a day. It is super easy to use and holds a good amount of water. I also love how appealing the kettle is and think that it decorates my kitchen., I’ve always used pots on the stove to heat my water and have always hated this method due to the taste of the water being distorted., I am unsure why people are saying they taste plastic from this kettle because I can’t taste it even slightly
This kettle replaced my old "Hamilton Beach"., I am glad I found Cosori! This one is much better and much easier to clean! Will ee after time, but now it is so good.

"I havent had this pot very long so I am not really sure how durable it is (how long it will last).  As far as its appearance, it is of good quality and well put together. This is the reason for 5 stars for durability."

reviews.reviewTitle: Does the job. Not my favorite.
reviews.reviewText: "Heats water fine. Holds condensation on the walls for literally days afterward, though, which I dont like. I realize its boiled water, should be clean, but it still grosses me out a little, Im afraid it will mildew. My last glass kettle didnt have this problem."

So we just got this in today. And so far we love it. We make hot tea every night. My kids were so excited over this. It’s really fast in heating up as well, and the blue light makes it so pretty. I’ll update the longer we have it.

Blue lights are cool. I like blue lights. I can’t speak to the longevity or durability of this kettle as I’ve only used it about ten times thus far.  What I can say is that it seems well-built, not flimsy, and works as advertised.

My wife got me this after observing how I miserably struggled with the regular kettle on a stove. The COSORI cattle is a massive step up, making my tea-making 10x faster and pain free. No hot spills, no messing with gas, etc, etc. Highly recommended for tea drinkers!

Love this kettle. I had a stainless steel, GE electric kettle for around 9 years and wanted an update to a glass kettle. This one is BEAUTIFUL! I love the glow of the base while it heats up and it heats very quickly and efficiently! Looks great on the counter and is perfect for my afternoon teas. Very pleased with this kettle and the customer service!

This electric kettle works as expected but now after a few months we have noticed that after the water has boiled and we go to pour it into the coffee mugs/tea cups the water drips onto the floor.  I think it is leaking between the base and the glass and that is the only time it leaks.  Thats the reason for four stars
Because of the light, its fun to look at it when its boiling., So far it has never failed., Easy to clean and maintain, just part of the kitchen now!

This is a MUST HAVE item in your kitchen. We use ours everyday, multiple times a day! It works great for tea/coffee. We also use it before we put water on the stove to boil. This electric kettle has multiple uses. We would recommend to anyone!

Update: the folks at Cosori sent me a new kettle and it works great, and I sent back the leaky one. Great customer service!, The kettle worked fine for about two weeks and I really liked it a lot, but all of a sudden it started leaking so I have to return it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Overall glass and minimum plastic. Excellent product!
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful and perfect! I wanted a kettle with stainless steel overall with cap also stainless steel. This kettle is perfect as per my expectation. There is only small portion of plastic getting in touch with inner portion of lid near handle. Otherwise it is overall glass and steel which makes me feel good to use.
This is the electric kettle that I enjoyed using abroad. Fast, simple and easy to use & cleanup. What more could you say.

"Just got this, but Im excited. I love the glass kettle & that the water doesnt touch plastic. Its not a super noisy kettle like the one I got for my son. Well see how durable it is as I use it every day."
This kettle checks all the boxes for what I like in a simple electric kettle. It heats the water very quickly. The construction is very good and high quality. The lights are a beautiful touch.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wow. Nice way to heat water!
reviews.reviewText: We have only used this two days. Both of us love this. Heats fast and to the temperature we like. Easy to fill and easy to clean. Would recommend., " Side note, love the blue light to let you know its on!"
We like this tea kettle very much. It boils very quickly and does turn itself off. Our last one was an other brand and did not turn itself off tho it was supposed to. This one also holds more water.
Great time saver, I can make tea when i am late for work so quickly. Fill my huge cup or make a pitcher of iced tea in like 2 minute. Turns itself off too. Love it so much
Everything I expected. I love the size! It holds ole ty of water to make tea for multiple people or to make French press coffee. It has an automatic off switch which is the tits.

Like: fast boil, sleek design, you can see that it is OFF because the blue light goes off., Dislike: lid does not open fully, making it hard to fill and clean., Despite the poor lid design, I like this product because it really boils to high heat and it is beautiful.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to clean and quick to boil water!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely the best! No more microwaving water. This electric kettle is so much faster than that! And it gets the water hotter than in the microwave too. Can’t believe I waited so long to get this. Easy to use and clean. LOVE!!
"The water boils fast, there is a pretty blue light that comes on when its working, even looks nice on my counter."
Love this and it works out perfectly. Definitely oxidation starting at the bottom and I’ve only had it for a couple of months, but it doesn’t affect what it’s doing

I tried several times to apply for the extended warranty but it would not work.  I have used it several times and it takes eight minutes to boil a max level of cool water. Not bad but not the six minutes described in the literature.  Overall it seems fine but I have not had it very long.  Time will tell.
Not only is this tea kettle beautiful, but it also works perfectly. It heats water quickly and is so easy to use.
"I love this because I dont have use my gas stove to heat up water for one cup of tea or making bullet proof coffee on the weekends."

I just received the electric kettle and Love the look of glass. It has a clean modern look and I’m sure will be Easier to clean then the plastic I had before.  To me the Cordless feature is the most important for convenience and safety.
The cosori glass kettle I received does not turn off automatically

reviews.reviewTitle: Better than your tea kettle. Will be buying more
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this. Purchased because it was a daily deal.  Some of the reviews concerned me though.  Ignore those reviews.  This item is so much better than my old tea kettle!
This kettle is substantial and well made. The lid opens widely enough to fill the kettle from the faucet. It looks good as it boils.
This kettle is easy to use, and very pretty. While the water is heating there is a blue light. It shuts off once the water has boiled. The design of the glass pitcher is also quite nice.
This product is one of my best recent purchases. It does not heat the surface it is sitting on. Water heats up in less than 5 minutes. Great for small apartments and dorms.

This product was a great buy and I am happy I splurged for it. My favorite thing about this product is that when you turn it on it glows blue making my kitchen have a fun ambience. Im also all for BPA free.

"Ordered this for Christmas and use it almost every day. Love how quickly it heats up water for tea or whatever. Also, if you need distilled or sterilized water, you can use the water that has cooled for whatever you need. The blue lights also make it fun. Great product so far. (Ive had it for a month)"
I keep this kettle in my office to make tea. It boils water so fast. I absolutely love this kettle. It cuts off when the water is done boiling. I can turn it on and walk away.
"Had this for a month and its working well. I use it daily, several times a day to heat bottles for my baby, for coffee and tea and to make oatmeal. No issues so far."
THE POT IS A BIT HEAVY FOR MY OLDER HANDS, BUT IT WORKS GREAT. AUTO SHUT OFF IS A REAL ASSET.. IT IS ATTRACTIVE AND EASILY CLEANED.

reviews.reviewTitle: Step away from the microwave and heat your water in a kettle
reviews.reviewText: Best product I’ve purchased all year. If you don’t have an electric kettle - get on it. Life changing., {{stop microwaving your water - other counties laugh at us for this!}}

I bought this after I received a text message from Treasure truck. I’m glad I did because I got sick right after I got this and it was wonderful and quick to brew hot tea. It’s a little noisy but compared to a traditional screaming kettle, I can deal with a little bit of noise.

"Heats water CRAZY fast. Easy to use, easy to clean, and while its a bit large, comes in handy when my burners are all being used for dinner and I need hot water for tea. Really cant get over how fast it heats the water. Absolutely love it."
"Ive replaced some very expensive kettles in the past and decided to go with this one. Very happy with the quality. The lid is wide, so its easy to clean. Would buy again."
"I got this fornmy room. I cant do stairs all the time. This madeso i can have a nice tea in my room"

"Ive had this thing for two months now and it is awesome. It heats up the water really fast, and looks pretty good on my counter. Also it has pretty good capacity so you can boil a bunch of water really fast. 5 stars."
Best of four different kettles I have used. All boil water only difference comes down to the cover. Stainless steel lined (no plastic drip from cover into my water) simple functional design.

Love the look and design of the kettle. I have to use bottle water due to high minerals in the water here which showed deposits the first time I used. After using bottled water no  deposits and looks clean.
"Ok, I like a hot cup of tea first thing in the morning. This pot heats up fast, I mean really fast. Its saving me time and I love that. Great way to start my day."
This is all glass, so there is no worry of rust. Heats up to boiling in about 5 min which is 3x as fast as our tea kettle on the gas stove. Great value for the price.
We are tea drinkers and occasionally drip coffee. This kettle is the best by far. Rapid heating, east to use, safe. Thanks for coming up with this one. Yahoo!

this was a Christmas present for my friend. After she used it 2 times the lid broke. She said it is very hard to put the, water in also. Would not recommend this to anybody., I want to change my review.. we had a problem with this item  however, the company quickly made it right., they were fast to react to our complaint which was better than most companies. I would buy this item again..
Where has this kettle been all my life? It boils so quickly and is perfect for my tea. I had stovetop glass kettle that I’m sure is perfectly safe but just made me nervous. This is wonderful!
I love this. I use it all the time for tea. So much easier than using up a pot. Boils water quicker than the stove too. It was worth the investment.
"Not sure if its the size of the kettle or because in the U.S. there is only 120 Voltage but the kettle takes ages to boil."
I love my kettle- its easy to use. The blue light gives it a cool effect and is easy to tell if the kettle is on. Very easy to clean with wide-mouth kettle.

reviews.reviewTitle: We love the stainless steel interior lid, no plastic.
reviews.reviewText: We love the kettle!  We knew it’ll be a well made product, since we have your pressure cooker, “instant pot”., We love your products and hope to discover more in the future.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not solidly designed or poorly assembled
reviews.reviewText: The lid has a small piece that came off at the spout and now I struggle to reassemble it so I can close the lid to activate it. Very flimsy or missing a part? Worked three times now no
It heats up pretty fast. We love to use it for tea. I love that the light goes off when the water is ready. It’s very easy to use.

Boils fast. Glass and food-grade stainless steel (including inside the lid) ensures a clean (non-plastic) taste. Pleasing design and illumination, easy to use, and a very wide opening lid for easy cleaning.
Love the blue light!  So far so it works perfectly.  Heats really quickly.
I am super impressed with this electric kettle. It only took a few minutes from the time I pressed the on button to a full, hard boil. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Been working for almost 9 months with daily use.
reviews.reviewText: "Seems pretty good.  9 months, every morning and it works great.  Ill update review if I have any problems."

reviews.reviewTitle: The top of the kettle was broken on the second month after I bought it
reviews.reviewText: The quality is bad. The top of the kettle was broken on the second month after I bought it. I purchased it because the rating is high, but very disapponted because it did not last long

reviews.reviewTitle: This is the water kettle of the future ladies and gents
reviews.reviewText: Hot water so fast you’ll freak. Beats the stove top hot water kettle in time to boil, as well as offers line of sight to water levels.

reviews.reviewTitle: A must have for every kitchen...
reviews.reviewText: This product is a must have for every kitchen. Looks great, works great so far, efficient, easy to use, boils water very quickly, love the auto shut off feature and blue light indicator when on.
I like the fact that it heats my water fast. Also get a little kick out of watching the water come to boiling. Doesnt take up much spa ce.
Bought this primarily for tea and LOVE it. Heats very quickly and is so easy to clean. All we do is empty the water and leave the top open to air dry. We use it several times a week without issue.

Over the years we went through 3 Capressos.  The plastic lid "axle" nubs breaking again was the last straw for us.  Thankfully had Amazon reviews to review and decided on this Cosori.  Found it to hold more water, no smell from bottom seal, and appearance is up to date with the blue ring light around the base of the carafe.  Been using it for about a week now and love it!

"We use the Cosori kettle daily and have had it for over a month.  I love that it is glass and I can see inside.  I have descaled it with vinegar and water twice following the instructions and it looks like new.  It holds 1.75 liters which is larger than my last kettle so it does take more time to boil.  I timed it when full and it took almost 8 minutes.  We dont often fill it up so it doesnt as much time to boil.  I also like the blue light when it is on as it really stands out."

reviews.reviewTitle: Love it. Totally worth it for the tea or instant coffee drinker
reviews.reviewText: I first used one of these in Japan. I loved it. So I got back here and ordered one. It has the auto shut off which works great. Very very easy to use and clean.  Very glad I bought it.

"My first electric kettle. It works great, I like the glass verses plastic on other ones. Yes there is a little plastic the water has to run over when pouring, but its as minimal as I could find. It had a somewhat plastic/chemical smell at first. It went away after a couple uses."
"We bought one previously that broke just after the warrantee was up. This seems better made and so far, its working very well."

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice way to heat up water quickly!
reviews.reviewText: I like the look of this , and how quickly it reaches boiling. I hope it is durable!
Developed rust spots within the first month. Followed instructions to descale using vinegar but made it even worse. Hopefully mine was just defective. Requested refund.

I don\t usually rate a product unless it\s a 1 or a 5. Most products are "meh", and don\t need a rating. This kettle is awesome. Very attractively designed. Very efficient. Love the clear glass reservoir design.
Heats quickly. Blue lights are very cool. Capacity is generous. Glass container lets you see water levels.
Works great for us. It heats the whole bottom so we find that most efficient. I wish I had multiple temperature sets.
I like it a lot but the only issue I strangling with is the auto shut off, it doesn’t seem to work fine multiple time the water boiling like crazy and it doesn’t shut off in its own.
"I read a lot of reviews before purchasing this COSORI Kettle. I one to two times per day, it boils in less than 3 minutes, and its the perfect sidekick to my new french press! I love it!"

reviews.reviewTitle: Efficient and easy to use! Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: "I absolutely love this electric kettle, it does an amazing job and is super efficient and easy to use. Customer service was super helpful when I couldnt get it to register for an extended warranty. I have a lot of calcium in my water and it isnt the easier to clean because of how far the lid comes up, but that is just being petty. Overall, I would recommend this to anyone."

I love the sleek look and the lights when it’s on. It hold a lot of water and love the fact it has auto shut off, as I usually have trouble getting to the kitchen quick enough to turn off a stove top kettle. due to a disability.

Nothing much more to say. It makes hot water, looks nice and simple, easy to use, and has resulted in me consuming much more tea then I would have ever expected., If this were to ever break, I would be quite sad until its replacement would arrive at my doorstep.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent kettle - stylish and very fast
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice looking kettle, and it has the performance to match! It boils water (its only job) very efficiently. We have had no trouble at all with it and use it multiple times every day.
Water boils fine, but it sounds like a large exhaust fan or furnace  is running when water is boiling.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not all stainless steel. Works well
reviews.reviewText: This is advertised as stainless steel, the lid is a shiny plastic. Ended up returning, it worked well the relatively short time we had it.
This is an amazing kettle for the price. You can always have boiling water at you finger tips. This is a must have for all American kitchens.
So much easier and quicker than a tea kettle. Have really enjoyed using it. Stores easy and frees up stove for other things
So far so good. I love the ease of this kettle and the style. Feels a lot more convenient to boil water this way verses teapot. And safer!
easy to set up no need for a lot of space fast boiling water I use it for a cup of tea, or French coffee press
We are major tea drinkers at my house. Within mins fresh tea is ready.Looks amazing on the counter.Cleaning is a breeze. Love the clear glass and blue neon lights.
Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. He loves it and uses it often when he works from home. Hears water quickly and has hot water for a while for various items. Oatmeal, tea, etc.
My new favorite Appliance! Heats water up quickly and looks nice on the counter. Sometimes I make hot tea just cuz I want to use it.
No bells, no whistles, just boils the water quickly and shuts off automatically.

"In my previous (not Cosori) glass pot electric kettles--3 of them same make-- the hinged lid kept breaking.  The hinged top of this Cosori glass kettle is solid and reliable, no matter how many times I use it during the day. Ive had it about three months and am very pleased with the purchase."
Love. Why woukd you pay more? This classic product is ideal. And the design is timeless. Fast hot water in an artful means. Love!

Kettle received in perfect condition- seems to work very well and fast! Like the fact that it turns off when water is boiled. Less chance of forgetting about it and burning the house down! Great price too!

This kettle heats up water faster than you can heat it on the stove without creating extra heat.  This can be important on a hot Texas day.  I like being able to see when the water is coming to a boil.  I also really like the blue light.  It just makes it more fun to use this kettle.
